10. DataUnit Descriptions¶

10.1. DataUnit Description Class – sinon.data_unit_description¶

class sinon.data_unit_description.DataUnitDescription(vals={})[source]¶

Bases: sinon.description.Description

name # A non-unique label. file_urls # Dict of logical and physical filesnames, e.g.:

# { ‘NAME1’ : [ ‘google://.../name1.txt’, # ‘srm://grid/name1.txt’], # ‘NAME2’ : [ ‘file://.../name2.txt’ ] }

lifetime # Needs to stay available for at least ... cleanup # Can be removed when cancelled size # Estimated size of DU (in bytes)
